headline: Anterix Launches Groundbreaking Utility Tower Access Product with Crown Castle to Accelerate 900 MHz Private Network Deployments
summary: Crown Castle, one of the nation’s largest tower companies, and Anterix, the leader in private wireless broadband, introduce a nationwide tower optimization solution to streamline costs and accelerate grid connectivity for utilitiesWOODLAND PARK, N.J., Nov. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anterix (NASDAQ: ATEX), the nation’s leader in private wireless broadband for critical infrastructure, and Crown Castle, one of the nation’s largest tower companies, today announced a powerful new turnkey tower ser
